body: Gregory discusses the need to connect tourism and music industry in Malawi: "Taking advantage of the fact that music pulls and attracts people and their world the tourism industry which sells our places out there would intensify promotion of the varieties at their places."
original_body: Gregory discusses the need to connect tourism and music industry in Malawi: "Taking advantage of the fact that music pulls and attracts people and their world the tourism industry which sells our places out there would intensify promotion of the varieties at their places."
title: Malawi: Connecting tourism and music industry
